<topcClas>Information technology - Media, communication and language</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) Telecommunications and Internet Statistics covers provides time series of telecommunications and economic indicators such as network dimension, revenues, investment and employment for OECD countries from 1980 onwards.  These data allows evaluation of policy performance in this sector across the OECD region.<br> <br> The OECD Telecommunications and Internet Statistics is made up of the Telecommunications Database and Broadband database.<br>  <br> The Telecommunications Database provides both telecommunication and economic time-series data covering thirty OECD Member countries from 1980 onwards. The broadband database on information and communication technology (ICT) contains indicators on wireless and fixed broadband usage, access and diffusion to OECD households, individuals and businesses.   <br> <br> These data were first provided by the UK Data Service in March 2015. The UK Data Service web site includes further information on the OECD Telecommunications and Internet Statistics holdings, including a <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/use-data/guides/dataset/telecom-statistics.aspx" title="OECD Telecommunications and Internet Statistics dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a> and details of <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/telecom/2013" title="OECD Telecommunications and Internet Statistics latest database updates">latest database updates</a>.<br> <br> Citation: The bibliographic citation for the database is: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development ({YYYY}): Telecommunications and Internet Statistics ({Edition: YYYY}). UK Data Service. DOI: {edition specific doi - e.g.<a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/telecom/2013" title="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/telecom/2013">http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/telecom/2013</a>}.  <br> <br> Alternative DOIs: <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.1787/tel_int-data-en" title="10.1787/tel_int-data-en">/10.1787/tel_int-data-en</a>   (to access via OECD.Stat subscription).<br> <br> <br> </abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd event="start" date="1980-01-01T00:00:00Z">1980</timePrd>         <timePrd event="end" date="2014-01-01T00:00:00Z">2014</timePrd>         <nation>Multi-nation</nation>         <geogUnit>Countries</geogUnit>         <universe>Cross-national; National</universe>         <universe>The countries covered are Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Chile, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Luxembourg, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovak Republic, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, United Kingdom, and United States. See <a href="http://www.oecd.org/about/membersandpartners/list-oecd-member-countries.htm" title="full list of OECD members and partners">full list of OECD members and partners </a>.</universe>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Time Series</timeMeth>         <sampProc>See documentation for details</sampProc>         <collMode>For details of methodology, please see the <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/use-data/guides/dataset/telecom-statistics.aspx" title="dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a></collMode>         <sources />         <ConOps>None</ConOps>         <ConOps>See documentation for details</ConOps>         <weight>See documentation for details</weight>       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac><a href=http://www.esds.ac.uk/international/access/dataset_overview.asp >ESDS International, Manchester Information and Associated Services </a></accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <specPerm>Restricted access</specPerm>         <restrctn>Registration is required and standard conditions of use apply.
